languages.text: {n}Офицер вздыхает.{/n} "Боюсь, вы исчерпали лимит. Оба положенных вам бойца уже сопровождают вас".
{n}The officer sighs.{/n} "I fear you have reached the regulations' limit, my {mf|lord|lady}. You are already accompanied by both of the fighters you are authorised to have at your side."
languages.original_text: {n}Офицер вздыхает.{/n} "Боюсь, вы исчерпали лимит. Оба положенных вам бойца уже сопровождают вас".

traits.locale_text: {n}The officer sighs.{/n} "I fear you have hit your limit, my {mf|lord|lady}. You are already accompanied by both of the fighters you are authorised to have at your side."

{n}The officer sighs.{/n} "I fear you have reached the regulations' limit, my {mf|lord|lady}. You are already accompanied by both of the fighters you are authorised to have at your side."

languages.text: {n}El oficial suspira.{/n} «Me temo que ya ha alcanzado el límite reglamentario, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Le acompañan los dos guerreros a los que tiene derecho».
languages.original_text: {n}The officer sighs.{/n} "I fear you have reached the regulations' limit, my {mf|lord|lady}. You are already accompanied by both of the fighters you are authorised to have at your side."

traits.locale_text: {n}El oficial suspira.{/n} «Me temo que ya ha alcanzado el límite reglamentario, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Le acompañan los dos guerreros a los que tiene derecho».

languages.text: {n}士官は、ため息をつく。{/n}「恐れながら、閣下、規則の上限に達しております。すでにお二人の戦士が閣下のお側に控えておりますので、これ以上はご同伴いただけません」
languages.original_text: {n}The officer sighs.{/n} "I fear you have reached the regulations' limit, my {mf|lord|lady}. You are already accompanied by both of the fighters you are authorised to have at your side."

traits.locale_text: {n}士官は、ため息をつく。{/n}「恐れながら、閣下、規則の上限に達しております。すでにお二人の戦士が閣下のお側に控えておりますので、これ以上はご同伴いただけません」
{n}士官は、ため息をつく。{/n}「恐れながら、閣下、規則の上限に達しております。すでにお二人の戦士が閣下のお側に控えておりますので、これ以上はご同伴いただけません」

languages.text: {n}军官叹了口气。{/n}“恐怕已经超过上限了，大人。您身边目前已经有了两位经您授权的战士。”
languages.original_text: {n}The officer sighs.{/n} "I fear you have reached the regulations' limit, my {mf|lord|lady}. You are already accompanied by both of the fighters you are authorised to have at your side."

traits.locale_text: {n}军官叹了口气。{/n}“恐怕已经超过上限了，大人。您身边目前已经有了两位经您授权的战士。”

languages.text: {n}L'officier soupire.{/n} « J'ai peur que vous ayez atteint la limite autorisée, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}. Vous disposez déjà de l'escorte de deux combattants à laquelle vous avez droit. »
languages.original_text: {n}The officer sighs.{/n} "I fear you have reached the regulations' limit, my {mf|lord|lady}. You are already accompanied by both of the fighters you are authorised to have at your side."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'officier soupire.{/n} « J'ai peur que vous ayez atteint la limite autorisée, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}. Vous disposez déjà de l'escorte de deux combattants à laquelle vous avez droit. »

languages.text: {n}Der Offizier seufzt.{/n} "Ich fürchte, Ihr habt die Grenze erreicht, die laut Vorschrift möglich ist, {mf|Lord|Lady}. Ihr werdet bereits von zwei Kämpfern begleitet, mehr stehen Euch nicht zu."
languages.original_text: {n}The officer sighs.{/n} "I fear you have reached the regulations' limit, my {mf|lord|lady}. You are already accompanied by both of the fighters you are authorised to have at your side."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Offizier seufzt.{/n} "Ich fürchte, Ihr habt die Grenze erreicht, die laut Vorschrift möglich ist, {mf|Lord|Lady}. Ihr werdet bereits von zwei Kämpfern begleitet, mehr stehen Euch nicht zu."

languages.text: {n}Subay iç çekiyor.{/n} "Korkarım mevzuat sınırına ulaştınız {mf|lordum|leydim}. Yanınızda bulundurmanıza müsaade edilen her iki dövüşçü de hâlihazırda size eşlik ediyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The officer sighs.{/n} "I fear you have reached the regulations' limit, my {mf|lord|lady}. You are already accompanied by both of the fighters you are authorised to have at your side."
